programme.title: Alba Today
programme.desc: BBC Alba joins Radio nan Gàidheal, the BBC's Gaelic language radio service

programme.title: AH-AH/No-No
programme.desc: Cùlag's new invention, the Parasol 3000, causes a huge problem when it freezes the pond

programme.title: Treubh an Tuathanais (Big Barn Farm)
programme.desc: When Coinneach the cockerel decides that he is the best person to be the farm leader, Mona challenges him and, as a result of this, they put it to a vote

programme.title: Pip & Posy
programme.desc: Pip and Posy have great fun when they scare one another on Spooky Saturday

programme.title: Oscar & Ealasaid
programme.desc: Ernest has lost a button on his accordion

programme.title: Sionnach agus Maigheach (Fox & Hare)
programme.desc: Brush really enjoys her holiday in the forest, which makes Fox want to go on a holiday as well

programme.title: Aithne air Ainmhidhean (All About Animals)
programme.desc: Following the activities of Ollie, an ostrich who hatched from the largest egg in the world - and now lives in Etosha National Park in Namibia

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda
programme.desc: Po lets his 'evil personality' escape from a magic mirror - leaving two Pos running amok

programme.title: An Là (News)
programme.desc: Local, national and international news and information from BBC Alba

programme.title: Dluth Bhearradh/Wallace & Gromit in A Close Shave
programme.desc: Nick Park's Oscar-winning animated characters embark on their third adventure following A Grand Day Out and The Wrong Trousers. Wallace falls in love with the lady proprietor of the local wool shop - only for Gromit to be framed for sheep rustling

programme.title: Crowdie and Cream
programme.desc: Three-part series based on Finlay J MacDonald's well-known trilogy about childhood, family, home and friendship. The story begins in 1930 with four-year-old Finlay and his family moving into a two-room tin house in the new village of Scarista. Bittersweet drama, starring Iain Macrae

programme.title: Prosbaig
programme.desc: Donald Morrison recalls uncertainty surrounding the completion of the Rhenigidale Road mid-way through its construction process, as reported by the BBC in the 1980s. Other vintage reports show the people of Berneray campaigning for a causeway, and fears that the prosperity the klondyker boom brought to Ullapool was nearing its end

programme.title: Leugh Mi (Book Show)
programme.desc: Anna Macleod invites Lana Pheuton and Kevin Rodgers to discuss books of special interest to them. Choices include Stephen King's Salem's Lot

programme.title: An Lot (The Croft)
programme.desc: Catching up with young crofter Donald 'Sweeny' MacSween on his croft in the Isle of Lewis, which has been in his family for more than 100 years

programme.title: Triall
programme.desc: Mary Ann Kennedy goes coast-to-coast on a musical pilgrimage, travelling by boots, boats and bike to her first live gig post-lockdown

programme.title: Sgeulachd Cogaidh na h-Artaig/Untold Arctic Wars
programme.desc: Documentary series that reveals the big picture of events in the Arctic during the Second World War. It shows the importance of the battles in that arena for the course of events for the war in general. The series dives deep into secret events and agreements between different parties, revealing the world-class game played in the Arctic. From the history research point of view, the Arctic is a gold mine - the area was a playground for a big political thriller centring around natural resources vital for the war industry

programme.title: Dealbh is Slighe
programme.desc: Calum Maclean paddleboards to a special beach, where he takes photos that reveal a whole new world

programme.title: The Barrowland Roar
programme.desc: Musician Iain Spanish MacKay fulfils a dream to perform at the famous Glasgow Barrowland Ballroom. But before that, he chats to some of the stars that have played there

programme.title: Cuirm@Celtic
programme.desc: An in-concert special from indie-folk act The Staves, recorded at Kelvingrove Museum and Art Gallery for Celtic Connections 2021

programme.title: Alba Today
programme.desc: BBC Alba joins Radio nan Gàidheal, the BBC's Gaelic language radio service

programme.title: Lon le Linda
programme.desc: Linda Macleod is joined by Hannah and Ailig to make fishcakes with potatoes and smoked salmon

programme.title: Pip & Posy
programme.desc: Pip and Posy have great fun when they scare one another on Spooky Saturday

programme.title: 'S E Iasg a Th'Annam (I'm a Fish)
programme.desc: The Tuna Fish tells us how speedy they are and how they are good hunters. They hunt with their friends, the dolphins, as the dolphins keep them safe from other predators

programme.title: Peataichean/Pets
programme.desc: Eilidh Cormack meets young children who are pet owners. Together they show, tell and share how they care for, play and interact with their pets at home

programme.title: Shane an Chef
programme.desc: Shane uses a drone to protect Magaidh's asparagus crops from a persistent crow

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Even though one of his wellies now has a hole, Bing is very reluctant to throw them into the dustbin

programme.title: Rita is Crogall
programme.desc: Rita and Crocodile make friends with a little hedgehog in Granny’s garden

programme.title: An Saoghal Droil aig Pol Ploc/The Rubbish World of Dave Spud
programme.desc: Betty wants a nice photo of Dave and Anna, but the camera George uses happens to belong to Gran, and funnily enough it has been cursed by an ancient mummy
An insight into Tom MacÌomhair’s life @12 years old

programme.title: A-null 's a-nall

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda

programme.title: Maorach - Hebridean Shellfish

programme.title: Lloyd of the Flies
programme.desc: An animated series about a young fly with a lot to prove. The newsstand has a new comic in stock called Llerd the Fly, and Lloyd is appalled to discover that Llerd is based on him! programme.desc: Animated comedy series. Sam gets jealous when Stella starts spending more time with Janelle because they both love sports, and the invention of a new sport called 'Basket-Boing' threatens to overshadow their friendship. Convinced that she'll impress Stella and win back her attention by scoring baskets, Sam asks for the power of perfect aim - the only problem is that Sam and Mo's aim is off by ten centimetres at half-power! In order to wow Stella on the court, Sam is going to need Mo's help...

programme.title: 50/50 Heroes
programme.desc: Animated comedy series. Mo tells Amber he agrees to help out in her parents' grocery store - he wants the Captain Responsible keyring on offer there. But it's a tedious job, long and repetitive. Mo asks the Scepter for the power to be super-fast! The trouble is - super-fast means super-messy. Worse, he soon discovers he has no control over his speed. He causes terrible damage, which has an unexpected effect on Amber. Mo has to find Sam, fix the grocery store - and fix Amber too!

programme.desc: The comedian hosts a special version of Strike It Lucky, with pairings from The Masked Singer, The Repair Shop and Love Island battling it out to win £25,000 for charity. Can they avoid the dreaded hotspots and come out on top?

programme.title: Chuck
programme.desc: The team fakes Casey's death in an elaborate attempt to capture the members of his former special ops team, who have turned rogue and gone underground

programme.title: One Tree Hill
programme.desc: Peyton prepares for the future, while Lucas takes Nathan and Jamie to an important place from his past. Elsewhere, Julian makes Brooke a surprising offer

programme.title: Dawson's Creek

After the first elimination, the two remaining players battle to reach the Super Catchphrase round, where one of them could win £50,000 for the charity of their choice

programme.title: Alan Carr's Epic Gameshow
programme.desc: The comedian hosts a supersized reboot of much-loved darts show Bullseye as four pairs of 'Knowers' and 'Throwers' take on the questions and the dartboards, for a chance to win big prizes in the Epic Endgame, including a luxury holiday to Mexico. With Richard Ashdown keeping the scores

programme.title: Superstore
programme.desc: The employees are forced to address systemic racism in the store, while Glenn does all that he can to right Cloud 9's many wrongs

programme.title: Superstore
programme.desc: Glenn returns from quarantine to resume store manager duties from Dina, while Jonah and Mateo are uneasy about helping Sandra with her sick cat

programme.title: Love Island
programme.desc: The Islanders face more love games as week five continues, and nobody is ready to leave just yet. So who will be happily coupled up - and who's in danger of getting dumped?

programme.title: Deep Fake Neighbour Wars
programme.desc: Floyd Mayweather and Dua Lipa feud with Matthew McConaughey over his big tree, and newlyweds Nicki Minaj and Tom Holland argue with Mark Zuckerberg about a leak

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter becomes so obsessed with 1963 hit single Surfin' Bird that Brian and Stewie go on a mission to destroy every copy. Their search leads them to a record store in Quahog, where they bump into Jesus - who has important news for them

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter puts out a fire at a fast-food restaurant and earns the gratitude of the owner, who rewards him with an unlimited supply of free burgers - with disastrous consequences for his health. Animation following the misadventures of America's disaster-prone Griffin family

programme.title: American Dad!
programme.desc: Stan joins Roger and Steve's fictional detective agency, but proves to be surprisingly incompetent at his imaginary job. An infuriated Roger orders Steve to fire him - but the youngster cannot bring himself to do it. Animated comedy, with the voice of Seth MacFarlane

programme.title: American Dad!
programme.desc: Roger becomes Steve's legal guardian, but his overzealous approach to parenting gets his adopted son's school principal fired. Meanwhile, Stan and Francine decide to make their own fun at the world's biggest water park

programme.title: Superstore
programme.desc: Mateo, Glenn and Sandra try to help Glenn move on after Amy, while Cheyenne is forced to shadow Carol for the day, and Garrett helps Dina find a secret location in the store

programme.title: Superstore
programme.desc: Jonah finds himself in trouble with Sandra when her son starts working at the store, while Garrett is thrust into the middle of Dina's relationship with Brian the vet

programme.title: Iain Stirling's CelebAbility
programme.desc: Will Best leads a group of three friends looking to win prizes by defeating Katherine Ryan, Indiya Polack, Luke Kempner and Rickie Haywood-Williams - in a series of silly games

programme.title: Totally Bonkers Guinness World Records
programme.desc: A selection of some of the most incredible and peculiar record-breaking attempts, including the world's largest violin, the heaviest weight lifted with the tongue and the heaviest vehicle pulled by someone's hair. Matt Edmondson narrates

programme.title: George and Mildred
programme.desc: George trades his car in for a battered caravan, and Mildred's sister and brother-in-law arrive, leading to problems in the bedroom. Comedy, starring Brian Murphy, Yootha Joyce, Norman Eshley and Sheila Fearn

programme.title: George and Mildred
programme.desc: George pushes Mildred to choose between him and the dog when he begins to resent the affection lavished upon her beloved pooch

programme.title: Inspector Morse
programme.desc: An opera singer is shot by a sniper at an Oxford University ceremony just as she is about to receive an honorary degree. Morse is a big fan of her work and thinks she could not possibly be involved in anything untoward, but his investigations turn up more than a few sordid secrets. Detective drama, starring John Thaw, Kevin Whately, Robert Hardy, Sheila Gish, John Gielgud and Rachel Weisz

programme.title: Carry On Again Doctor (1969)
programme.desc: A disgraced surgeon sets up a clinic in the hope of promoting a supposedly miraculous slimming potion made from secret ingredients discovered on a remote tropical island. Comedy, starring Sid James, Kenneth Williams, Jim Dale, Barbara Windsor, Charles Hawtrey, Hattie Jacques, Pat Coombs and Joan Sims

programme.title: Rosemary & Thyme
programme.desc: Laura and Rosemary are asked to restore an ornate water garden cascade in the grounds of a health spa, where they are invited to join owner Frances Caldecott and her children for dinner. That evening, the duo discover Frances has been strangled and her jewellery stolen, and set out to catch the culprit. Drama, starring Felicity Kendal and Pam Ferris

programme.title: Rosemary & Thyme
programme.desc: The duo are hired to cure a patchy lawn at a select language school hiding dark secrets. The disappearance of a Polish student alerts them to a tale of passion, rivalry and revenge, and when a handyman is found with his throat cut they race to find the killer. Drama, starring Felicity Kendal and Pam Ferris

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: The detective finds himself investigating the strange and gruesome murder of an elderly psychiatrist. Elsewhere, Poirot's old friend Ariadne Oliver is being pressed to uncover the truth behind two decade-old deaths. As the pair dig deep for evidence, they soon discover that their separate investigations are linked and join forces to solve the overarching mystery. David Suchet, Zoe Wanamaker and Greta Scacchi star

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: The sleuth is reunited with sidekick Captain Hastings (Hugh Fraser), secretary Miss Lemon (Pauline Moran) and Inspector Japp (Philip Jackson) in a case that plunges him into the world of global espionage as the Second World War looms. The public are in panic after the shocking death of Russian grandmaster Ivan Savaranoff during a game of chess. Poirot must try to determine the good guys from the bad in a complex plot that sees the main figures used like pawns. David Suchet stars in a story adapted by Mark Gatiss and Ian Hallard

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: The sleuth is reunited with old friend Ariadne Oliver, who has been commissioned to stage a game of murder hunt at a summer fete in the grounds of Nasse House, the recently purchased home of wealthy financier Sir George Stubbs. However, the novelist's instincts tell her she's getting involved in something much darker - and she's proved right when the girl volunteering to play the part of the victim really does turn out to be dead. Whodunit, starring David Suchet, with Zoe Wanamaker, Sean Pertwee, Martin Jarvis, Sam Kelly, Sinead Cusack, Rosalind Ayres and Tom Ellis

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby and Jones investigate the cloistered world of Midsomer Priory when a nun is found strangled. The detectives uncover a complex mystery involving holy orders, teenage romantic liaisons, African art and missing antique silver as the community is forced to open its doors to 21st-century policing. Starring Neil Dudgeon and Jason Hughes, with Cliff Parisi

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Members of the Midsomer-in-the-Marsh Ornithological Society fall out when Ralph Ford claims to have spotted a blue-crested hoopoe, meaning he wins the group's year-listing competition. However, their president Patrick Morgan says the rare species could never have been seen so far away from its native Uganda and brands him a cheat. The next day, Barnaby and Jones have a murder case on their hands when Patrick is found dead at the scene of the reported sighting. Guest starring Paul Nicholls and James Dreyfus

programme.title: The Suspicions of Mr Whicher
programme.desc: Another chance to see the second instalment of the crime drama starring Paddy Considine as the pioneering 19th-century inspector. Having left the Metropolitan Police under a cloud, Whicher's days as a detective are behind him. However, when he saves a respectable country lady from a violent robbery in a dangerous part of London, she hires him to investigate the savage murder of her 16-year-old niece. The investigation pits Whicher against wealthy and powerful figures, as well his former colleagues in the Met, and leads to a psychiatric institution where he must confront his own demons. Co-starring Olivia Colman, Shaun Dingwall and Mark Bazeley

programme.title: Scott & Bailey
programme.desc: Crime drama following the personal and professional lives of two detectives working for a Manchester police unit that specialises in murder cases. DC Janet Scott (Lesley Sharp) and DC Rachel Bailey (Suranne Jones) investigate the case of a pregnant woman who was killed in her bedroom. Meanwhile, Rachel's love life takes a turn for the worse and Janet gets a call that reawakens a past tragedy. Also starring Rupert Graves, Amelia Bullmore and Nicholas Gleaves

programme.title: Unwind with ITV
programme.desc: Daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: George and Mildred
programme.desc: The Ropers' television breaks down, and fixing it is a question of whether the British Museum has the parts in stock. Comedy, starring Brian Murphy and Yootha Joyce

programme.title: Inspector Morse
programme.desc: A man accused of murdering five people is killed in prison shortly before going to trial, wrapping up a lot of loose ends and saving the state the expense of keeping him behind bars indefinitely. Alas, Morse cannot help wondering why the body of one of his victims was never found - and the chance discovery of a corpse gives him the perfect opportunity to investigate further. John Thaw and Kevin Whately star

programme.title: Carry On Up the Jungle (1970)
programme.desc: A Victorian explorer recalls how he was recruited by an aristocrat to find her missing son in the African jungle. Teaming up with a fearless hunter, he hoped to find a rare bird on his journey - but instead fell into the clutches of an all-female tribe. Comedy, starring Sid James, Frankie Howerd, Joan Sims, Kenneth Connor, Charles Hawtrey and Terry Scott

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: Louisa decides to leave for Spain with baby James and says an awkward goodbye to Martin, but when he finds the scan of her brain, he spots a malformation and realises she could suffer a haemorrhage if she gets on the plane. Will the doctor make it to the airport in time? Meanwhile, Margaret reveals the real reason she has come to Portwenn, and disaster strikes at Bert and Jennifer's engagement party when Caroline receives an electric shock

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple
programme.desc: As the sole witness to a dying man's last words, Bobby Attfield is determined to solve the riddle they present, and forms an unlikely alliance with socialite Frankie Derwent and visiting family friend Miss Marple to help him on his quest. A trail of clues leads them to Castle Savage, where they uncover a hotbed of stifled emotion, treachery and deceit among its strange inhabitants. Murder mystery, starring Julia McKenzie, with a supporting cast that includes Sean Biggerstaff, Samantha Bond, Richard Briers, Rafe Spall, Warren Clarke, Mark Williams, Georgia Moffett, Helen Lederer and Rik Mayall

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: The sleuth falls victim to depression after failing to prevent the murder of a society girl by notorious art thief Marrascaud. His confidence shattered, Poirot eventually returns to work when a lonely chauffeur begs him to find his missing soulmate, the maid of a famous Russian dancer. The investigation takes him to the Swiss Alps, where, against all odds, he stumbles upon a hotel thought to be Marrascaud's hideout - leading to a very personal showdown. The penultimate episode of the long-running detective drama, starring David Suchet, with Simon Callow, Orla Brady, Patrick Ryecart, Nigel Lindsay, Morven Christie, Tom Austen and Rupert Evans

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: David Suchet takes on his final case as the Belgian sleuth in the last-ever episode of the long-running drama. Crippled with arthritis, Poirot is now using a wheelchair and has a life-threatening heart condition, but remains as sharp as ever. Calling on old friend Captain Hastings for assistance, he returns to Styles, where the pair first met 30 years earlier on a murder investigation. The detective is convinced the country house is once again harbouring a killer, and as guests fall victim to a mysterious attacker, he must summon the last of his strength to battle his ultimate nemesis. With Hugh Fraser, Anne Reid, Philip Glenister, Helen Baxendale, Matthew McNulty, Anna Madeley and Shaun Dingwall

programme.title: Rosemary & Thyme
programme.desc: Laura and Rosemary investigate the mysterious death of a blind professor caught up in a bitter battle to save his beloved allotment from an unscrupulous land developer. A heady blend of weedkiller, cannabis and high finance hangs in the air as the duo search for clues - and another body is turned up before they track down the villain. Drama, starring Felicity Kendal and Pam Ferris

programme.title: Rosemary & Thyme
programme.desc: Rosemary and Laura are employed to restore a country churchyard in time for a medieval fair, but it is not long before a local landowner is killed by an arrow beneath an ancient yew in the centre of the graveyard. The duo investigate the possibility that rival bidders for the victim's highly desirable farm are to blame - though affairs of the heart might offer a more likely motive. Drama, starring Felicity Kendal and Pam Ferris

programme.title: The Larkins
programme.desc: With wit, charm and a little bit of cunning, the Larkins woo Charley the taxman. Mariette agrees to put her plans on hold and stay for the summer, but with the arrival of Charley and the enigmatic Tom Fisher her heart is pulled in many directions. Bradley Walsh and Joanna Scanlan star, with Sabrina Bartlett

programme.title: The Savoy
programme.desc: Documentary offering a glimpse into the lives of those lucky enough to check into the glamorous London hotel, and those who serve them. Tonight, staff prepare for the re-opening of the hotel's world-famous American bar, the oldest cocktail bar in London, with a new menu and an updated look

programme.title: Foyle's War
programme.desc: The detective is drawn into the strange murder of eminent art historian Professor Van Haren, who was really a former high-ranking Nazi hired by MI5 due to his expert knowledge of Soviet intelligence. Meanwhile, as Sam's husband Adam embarks on a busy career as an MP, she worries whether she will be able to share some big news with him. Crime drama set in the 1940s, starring Michael Kitchen and Honeysuckle Weeks, with Tamzin Outhwaite and Rupert Vansittart

programme.title: Upstairs, Downstairs
programme.desc: Elizabeth embarks upon an affair with influential Armenian Julius Karekin, who buys her a hat shop - but his former mistress seems intent on causing mischief. Donald Burton guest stars, with Nicola Pagett, Gordon Jackson and Jean Marsh

programme.title: Upstairs, Downstairs
programme.desc: The Bellamys learn of Sarah's pregnancy, and to protect the real father she tells them she was seduced by a stranger. Watkins the chauffeur offers to marry her and deviously turns the situation to his advantage, but his plot is under threat of being uncovered

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple
programme.desc: Lady Virginia Revel receives a marriage proposal from an ambitious politician, but is reluctant to accept it, especially as she is also being courted by a dashing young suitor. Accompanied by Miss Marple, she travels to a weekend party at her family home Chimneys, hoping to reach a decision. Negotiations for the sale of the country house are taking place during the gathering, but when new owner Count Ludwig of Austria is found murdered, St Mary Mead's elderly spinster must identify the culprit. Whodunit, starring Julia McKenzie, with a supporting cast including Gavin & Stacey stars Ruth Jones and Mathew Horne, plus Dervla Kirwan, Charlotte Salt, Michelle Collins, Jonas Armstrong and Edward Fox

programme.title: George and Mildred
programme.desc: Poor George feels outnumbered when he learns Mildred's mother could be moving in. Comedy, starring Brian Murphy and Yootha Joyce

programme.title: George and Mildred
programme.desc: George seeks solace when his budgie dies, but Mildred is too preoccupied with finding something good enough to donate to the jumble sale. Comedy, starring Brian Murphy and Yootha Joyce

programme.title: George and Mildred
programme.desc: George celebrates his 24th wedding anniversary by presenting Mildred with a carriage clock. However, he has purchased it cut-price from a dubious source, and when the Fourmiles return from holiday they find their home burgled, and among the missing items is a carriage clock. Comedy, starring Brian Murphy and Yootha Joyce

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Scott locks himself and Jean in a garage, refusing to come out until Zoe grants him visiting rights. Terry looks forward to coming home from hospital

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Marlon contemplates life without Tricia, while at the hospital he faces a heart-rending decision. Later, Charity's charm irritates Zoe

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Gail and the family wonder if their lives will ever get back to normal as the press follow their every move, and Peter begs Tracy not to spill the beans about Lucy

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: With Shelley sobbing away, Peter braces himself for an emotional confession, while Gail hits the bottle as the pressure of being married to a known murderer takes its toll

programme.title: George and Mildred
programme.desc: The Ropers take in a lodger, and Mildred is delighted when he begins doing all the household jobs that George will not tackle. Comedy, starring Brian Murphy and Yootha Joyce

programme.title: George and Mildred
programme.desc: George is told to mind his table manners when Mildred invites her sister round for a meal. Brian Murphy and Yootha Joyce star

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: The residents are pleased when a fair comes to Elsinby, but Jeffrey and Samantha have their work cut out when the waltzer operator becomes trapped in the ride's mechanism. He's rushed to the hospital, where Mr Rose operates, and reveals his father has been suffering dizzy spells recently. A concerned Jeffrey heads back to the fairground, but he's too late to prevent disaster. Meanwhile, Ken hatches a dubious money-making scheme and Jill is forced to confront a patient's wife. Paul Fox, Anna Madeley and Amy Robbins star

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: A group of drunken mods arrive at the hospital in a shocking state, and Ken Hopkirk soon makes the grim discovery that they have been drinking industrial alcohol supplied by their friend, theatre technician Alun Morris. Meanwhile, a fourth member of the boozing group is brought in and has his stomach pumped immediately - but it soon emerges that the illicit hooch has blinded him. Elsewhere, Mr Rose and his surgical team treat a widow with a gangrenous toe at her farmhouse, and student nurse Samantha Beaumont receives a telling-off for laying out operating instruments in an incorrect order. Andy Wear, Michael Starke and Robert Daws star, with a guest appearance by Thelma Barlow

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Abandoned by his wife and faced with financial ruin, local farmer Richard Harvey finally reaches the end of his tether, and heads into Aidensfield to air his grievances in a particularly memorable way. Meanwhile, the arrival of a handsome stranger sets Gina's heart racing - but he could be a dangerous criminal. Vernon and David branch out into a new line of business, and soon manage to pep up a few palates with Aunt Beth's tangy horseradish sauce

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Bellamy thinks he's pulled off quite a coup when he spies a dangerous armed robber, but the villain makes his escape and embarks on a desperate hunt for a fast car to steal. Meanwhile, Merton's singer-songwriter cousin arrives, looking for the peace and quiet she needs to work, but her pregnant daughter soon puts paid to that idea. Lulu guest stars

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Zoe surprises Scott with a tempting offer, Marlon receives welcome news and Terry refuses to help Charity, vowing to stay loyal to Chris. Bob does his best to entertain his patient, but it's not easy

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Zoe promises to keep Terry's job open while he recuperates, as she sets out to manipulate witnesses in Charity's case. Marlon gives cause for concern and Chloe aims to profit from others' misfortune

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Gail is amazed to discover the police suspect her of being involved in Richard's dodgy dealings, Peter makes the most of Shelley's absence to visit fiancee number two, and Ashley returns to work - only to discover Fred's housekeeping skills leave a lot to be desired

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: David and Sarah eagerly await their return to school as Gail's mood fails to improve, while Jack and Vera make things worse by selling their story to a local paper

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: The dapper Belgian sleuth receives several anonymous letters outlining a killer's intention to murder a succession of people in alphabetical order, prompting him to try to unmask the culprit before the body-count mounts. Crime drama based on the Agatha Christie novel, starring David Suchet, with Pippa Guard, Donald Sumpter and Miranda Forbes

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Local landowner Les Parnaby loses patience with ramblers wandering across his land and resolves to take matters into his own hands - regardless of the cost. Meanwhile, Ventress's car accident has a strange effect on Vernon Scripps, much to the delight of his many creditors. Rural police drama, starring Lloyd McGuire, Geoffrey Hughes and Tricia Penrose

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: The police leap into action when a labourer at the Kirkbys' farm dies of strychnine poisoning, believing a killer is on the loose. As the finger of suspicion moves from one villager to another, the scene is set for tragedy. Meanwhile, the Ashfordly Rotary Club pensioners head for the seaside town of Whitby - but David's mangy mutt Alfred proves to be something of a liability

programme.title: Endeavour
programme.desc: As plans to build a new police station lead Morse to question his place in the force, he investigates the case of Tommy Cork, a boy from a broken home who has disappeared. Meanwhile, the body of disreputable journalist Eric Patterson has been found on railway tracks in mysterious circumstances. He was last seen embroiled in an argument with a council official about a company preparing to redevelop the site of Blenheim Vale, a disused correctional facility for boys. When a petty criminal with a connection to Blenheim absconds from an open prison, it sets off a chain reaction of events that threaten to expose horrors of the past. Did missing Tommy witness something that cost him his life?

programme.title: Law & Order: UK
programme.desc: Brooks agrees to help old friend and partner Jimmy Valentine with an undercover drug sting, but when the bust goes wrong and a dealer ends up dead, suspicion falls on the officers. As Devlin pushes for the truth, the spotlight turns on Brooks' dark past, and a 10-year-old case involving no witnesses and a large quantity of missing heroin. Guest starring Hustle's Robert Glenister, former Rising Damp star Don Warrington and Anna Chancellor (Four Weddings and a Funeral), alongside Bradley Walsh, Jamie Bamber and Freema Agyeman

programme.title: The Bay
programme.desc: After dealing with the repercussions of her actions from last year, DC Lisa Armstrong is given the opportunity to step up when asked to assist a murder investigation in Morecambe. Tensions remain high as Lisa struggles to do her job whilst following the orders of her previously lower ranking colleague, Med. As the team tries to uncover why the victim was targeted, Lisa and her children are unknowingly stalked by a mysterious figure. Return of the crime drama, starring Morven Christie, Daniel Ryan and Stephen Tompkinson

Plus, what it takes to craft a spoon fit for the Downing Street dinner table, and the British bangers made by a family run firm, turning the sausage status-quo on its head

Braving hungry crocodiles and deadly tides, he hopes to become one of the first people to catch this elusive creature

programme.title: Tour De France Live 2023
programme.desc: Coverage of stage one, featuring a 182km route, starting and finishing in Bilbao, Spain. The last kilometre is a 5.4 per cent rise to the finish line, meaning a breakaway or a punchy sprinter could take the first yellow jersey. Gary Imlach presents, with analysis from Peter Kennaugh and Cadel Evans, reports by Daniel Friebe and Matthew Rendell, and commentary from Ned Boulting and David Millar

programme.title: Monster Carp

programme.desc: The chef's culinary tour of France leads him to the diverse and distinct region of the Camargue, a natural region located south of Arles. James begins at Les Marquises, the Laurent family's farm, where he learns about the Camargue bull, and barbecues local fish for the family. Later, he visits a rice farm and cooks a risotto using his own rice-brewed beer

programme.title: Gino's Italian Escape
programme.desc: Gino D'Acampo reaches Alberobello, where he learns about the history of the town's cone-shaped trulli houses and gets a lesson in making the local pasta orecchiette. He then heads to the city of Lecce - known as the Florence of the South for its stunning baroque architecture. Here he finds out about local tradition of cartapesta - or papier mache - and creates chicken skewers with sticky marinade

programme.title: Gino's Italian Escape
programme.desc: Gino D'Acampo reaches the end of his journey in Santa Maria Di Leuca. He enjoys a tour of Italy's most southerly church, and cooks a saffron and chicken risotto for the priest and some of the nuns who work there. Gino also visits Leuca's famous waterfall, which was built by Mussolini and is only switched on for special occasions, before heading out by boat to see the end of Italy from the water. For his final dish, Gino cooks locally caught swordfish with rosemary sauteed potatoes and tangy gremolata

programme.title: Supermarkets Unwrapped
programme.desc: The Food Unwrapped team take a deep dive into the nation's favourite supermarket aisles. In this first episode, the team chill out in the freezer aisle. Jimmy Doherty investigates why there's more to frozen chips than just potatoes, Helen Lawal learns why frozen ready meals have best-before dates, Briony May Williams gets the inside scoop on soft-scoop ice cream, and Andi Oliver learns how to get the most out of your freezer at home

programme.title: Kirstie and Phil's Love It or List It: Brilliant Builds
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer look back at some of their favourite properties from the show. They begin in Cullercoats, on North Tyneside, where Mark and Suze Drummond have emotional ties to their Victorian townhouse - special memories that are making it difficult for Suzie to consider leaving. In Rushden, Northamptonshire, Susan and John Antoniou-Bailey are torn over their unique five-bedroom home. Susan loves its history and original features, but John has had enough of constantly moving between the disjointed, boxy rooms

programme.title: Evacuation
programme.desc: British soldiers come face to face with the enemy when Taliban fighters breach the airfield. But with the Taliban now in control of the country, they're forced to put old hostilities aside as they work together to control the crowds. Young soldiers must make life-and-death decisions on who is eligible for evacuation, while in the air, one pilot narrowly avoids a catastrophic collision - while the RAF must decide whether to overload aircraft to take more evacuees

programme.title: Wonders of the World I Can't See
programme.desc: Chris McCausland visits Jordan in the Middle East with actor, writer and comedian Guz Khan, to visit the magnificent ancient city of Petra. But before they head to the wonder, Chris floats for the first time in his life in the Dead Sea, and the pair almost melt during an intense facial spa treatment. In Petra itself, they haggle with shopkeepers, ride camels and listen to tales told by candlelight, before ending their trip with traditional music and a Bedouin feast

programme.title: Dr Death
programme.desc: Duntsch attempts to gain privileges at another local hospital as Henderson and Kirby travel to Tennessee to conduct an interview

programme.title: I'm Your Man (2021)
programme.desc: To obtain research funds for her studies, a scientist accepts an offer to live with a humanoid robot, created to make her happy. Comedy drama, starring Maren Eggert and Dan Stevens. In German with English subtitles

programme.title: Dispatches
programme.desc: The full story of Boris Johnson's friendship with press baron Evgeny Lebedev and his former KGB spy father, Alexander Lebedev. Including exclusive interviews with intelligence officials and senior political figures who warned the former Prime Minister against the friendship, knowing it would put him 'in a direct line of being able to be influenced and compromised'. Despite being told by both Britain's security services and the House of Lords Appointments Commission that the friendship was dangerous, Johnson ignored this advice and became the first Prime Minister to over-rule intelligence advice related to national security for a parliamentary nomination

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay visits PJ's Steakhouse in Queens, New York, to provide his expert advice to the owners. They decided to turn a successful bar into a high-end restaurant, but without any previous experience in managing a business they found themselves seriously in debt. With an over-confident chef and a partner propping up the bar, co-owner Madalyn faces a few difficult decisions

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud meets artists Indi and Rebecca, who are planning to construct a modern, larch-clad home on the Isle of Skye, with a second hand-crafted building alongside to use as their studio, all on a tight budget of £150,000. They have been saving for years, but making it happen will mean taking on the savage weather, not to mention the sceptical locals - and as if that weren't enough, most of the work is being done by one man, local builder Donald

programme.title: George Clarke's Amazing Spaces
programme.desc: The architect meets master craftsman Paul, who has muscular dystrophy and is saving a Victorian circus wagon. George also finds out about a grain store being re-imagined as a festival bar, discovers a small hotel disguised as a tree and a camping pod that looks like a giant conker

programme.desc: Following engineers and designers as they race to construct the Seven Seas Explorer. Their aim is to make it the most luxurious ship of its type, designed to convey 750 passengers when others of its size would hold 5,000

programme.title: Princess Anne: Dignity and Duty
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the life of Princess Anne, the queen's only daughter. The programme examines her skill as a horse rider, representing Britain in three-day eventing at the 1976 Olympics on her mother's horse, as well as her support for various charities and foundations, and the incident in 1974, when she survived an attempt to kidnap her and hold her to ransom

programme.title: Secrets of the Royal Palaces
programme.desc: A look at the history of Highgrove House in Gloucestershire, which is the family residence of the King Charles and Queen Camilla. The programme also hears from a witness to Prince Philip's 2019 car crash near Sandringham, which led to him handing in his driving licence

programme.title: Prince Edward: Will He Change the Royals?
programme.desc: Charting the life of the Duke of Edinburgh as he rose to become one of the most important members of the royal family, featuring archive footage and interviews with historians, royal insiders and journalists. The film looks at the prince' long and happy marriage to Sophie, Duchess of Edinburgh, as well as his decision to become a full-time working royal, and how his family have grounded him

programme.title: When Celebrity Goes Horribly Wrong
programme.desc: Contributors including Union J's Jaymi Hensley, Vanessa Feltz, Carole Malone, Adam Rickitt and Carol Decker recall the popstars, actors, comedians and even astronauts embroiled in everything from sex scandals to televised meltdowns. Unflattering episodes featured include Jimmy Carr's public shaming for tax avoidance, Naomi Campbell's blood diamond debacle, Justin Lee Collins's career-stopping harassment conviction and Leo Sayer's 'clean pants' rant in the Celebrity Big Brother house. Plus, Dustin Diamond, of Saved by the Bell fame, reveals the truth behind his ill-judged sex tape and veteran newsreader Ed Mitchell describes how alcoholism left him homeless

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Lee is confronted by a particularly mouthy motorist who does not know when to call it a day, and Liam arrests a man who denies carrying out a shocking attack, despite the CCTV evidence. Tasers are drawn after a van driver causes carnage and a wanted man holes up in a loft and refuses to come quietly, resulting in a shower of loft insulation, pepper spray and abuse

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Spike takes the lead against a runaway car thief in one of the most challenging pursuits ever, while Liam investigates a gang of suspected drug dealers from Nottingham. Elsewhere, supposedly straightforward stop for Jacko snowballs into a late-night showdown with an aggressive youngster

programme.title: Inside the Tower of London
programme.desc: Historic Royal Palaces interpretation officer Emma Bell has a bold plan to transform the fortress into a spectacular winter wonderland, inspired by the Tower's famous menagerie. Chief curator Tracy Borman uncovers how a grumpy Henry VIII rejected his wife Catherine of Aragon's Christmas gifts, Beefeater Darren Hardy takes the Yeoman Warders carol-singing around their homes in the Casemates cottages, and the Tower community comes together for a special service in the Chapel Royal

programme.title: Inside the Tower of London
programme.desc: Raven chicks are born in the tower for the first time in 30 years - but only one of the newborn birds can stay, and ravenmaster Chris faces the tough decision of choosing one to keep and finding suitable homes for all the others. The tower director prepares to retire after 15 years, and takes a moment to enjoy his final gun salute, while AJ Clarke, only the second woman to join the Yeoman warders, embarks on a fitness regime that soon leaves her in need of a new uniform. Plus, a look at the story of the time the future Queen Elizabeth I was imprisoned in the tower for plotting to overthrow her sister, Queen Mary

programme.title: The Great Fire of London
programme.desc: Dan Jones, Suzannah Lipscomb and Rob Bell take a fresh look at the 1666 conflagration by walking the actual route the fire took across the city, hour-by-hour and street-by-street, hoping to uncover what really happened during Britain's worst inferno. In this first edition, the three presenters investigate how the fire started, heading to Pudding Lane, site of the bakery where the blaze broke out. Dan and historian Dorian Gerhold then place a temporary 'blue plaque' on the very spot where the fire began

programme.title: 5 News Weekend
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world

programme.title: Princess Margaret: Duty Over Desire
programme.desc: A profile of Elizabeth II's younger sister, who was determined to live her life exactly as she wanted, even if that sometimes meant bringing the monarchy into disrepute. As a child she was as a mischievous and rebellious princess who loved being the centre of attention, while when she split up with photographer Anthony Armstrong-Jones she became the first major royal to get divorced so since Henry VIII

programme.title: Happy Campers: The Caravan Park

programme.title: Coastguard: Every Second Counts
programme.desc: Documentary following the work of the Maritime and Coastguard Agency across the length and breadth of the UK. In the first edition, a Regulatory Compliance Investigations Team looks into the death of a tugboat crewman in Liverpool, while a crew at Sumburgh Search and Rescue respond to a mayday call from a fishing trawler in serious trouble in the North Sea

programme.title: The Motorway
programme.desc: Patrollers Mick and Mike are called to a potentially fatal incident. A man is reported running across a dual carriageway near Nottingham and a desperate call from an SOS phone soon explains why - his car has broken down on the blind corner of a slip road and his wife and children are still inside. Near Leeds, people are spotted illegally walking along the M1, so patrollers Gareth and Nick are sent to intercept them

programme.title: Police Code Zero: Officer Under Attack
programme.desc: A man slashes an officer in London, another is kicked in the groin and a late-night patrol ends with a police officer in a choke hold

programme.title: HMP Long Lartin: Evil Behind Bars
programme.desc: Documentary exploring life inside HMP Long Lartin in Evesham, Worcestershire, a maximum-security prison which holds some of Britain's most brutal criminals, the majority of which are serving life sentences. Some of its notorious inmates include the Suffolk Strangler, serial killer Steve Wright, who murdered five women, and Colin Ireland, the serial killer who killed five homosexual men. Female staff reveal what it's like to work around high-profile criminals who have killed women, ex-inmates share their stories of dealing and taking illegal drugs, as well as brewing up their home-made alcoholic drink called hooch and enjoying parties on the prison's wings

programme.desc: Officers join forces with the National Police Air Service to stop two suspects in a car believed to have cloned plates. Units on the ground strike with a stinger, but that doesn't stop the driver from swerving off the road and taking the pursuit into cornfields. Following intel about a suspected drug dealer, the Roads Crime Team activates stealth mode and surround the suspect's vehicle

programme.title: 5 News Update
programme.desc: The latest reports

programme.title: Police: Night Shift 999
programme.desc: Road policing officer Sgt Gladwin and PC Hammond are called out when a van with a trailer crashes on a motorway on the Avon and Somerset border. There is debris all over the road threatening the lives of unsuspecting motorists coming up at speed towards the metal panels strewn across the carriageway in the dark

programme.title: Ambulance: Code Red
programme.desc: Two men are injured after an explosion at a firm that specialises in the disposal of hazardous waste. Jay and Paul were both caught in a fireball and have burns on their faces. Jay also has burns on his hands and knees. Dr Katie White and critical care paramedic Karen Baker are immediately dispatched

programme.title: 999: Critical Condition
programme.desc: A builder has had a 25-foot fall through a roof, and Trauma Team Leader Diane Adamson finds spinal fractures which need immediate treatment. Elsewhere, a young woman has an acute asthma attack and her body is in danger of shutting down, and a pregnant woman suffering from papillary thyroid cancer must undergo surgery to remove her thyroid and 30 lymph nodes

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Mick leads a team raiding two flats whose occupants are suspected of producing and selling a drug known as spice. Duncan is involved in a high-speed pursuit, which ends with tracker dog Tia on the escaping offender's trail

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: GPs: Behind Closed Doors
programme.desc: Dr Razak's first patient Michael has a nasty bruise on his arm after falling in his driveway. Sarah comes in after experiencing extreme gynaecological pain, and the doctors are keen for her to see a specialist as soon as possible. Baby Yusuf arrives for his eight-week checks, and Dr Qamar supports a patient who has been struggling with anxiety

programme.title: Rich House, Poor House
programme.desc: Multimillionaires Steve and Gemma, their daughter Sadie and Steve's granddaughter Arianna swap lives for a week with Ben, his partner Demi and their daughter Lillie. Steve and Gemma live in a newly renovated five-bedroom house in the seaside town of Redcar and own nearly 80 properties worth over £6 million, while Ben and Demi live in a rented two-bedroom, terraced house in Co Durham and rely on Ben's zero-hour contract work as a roofer

programme.title: The Railways That Built Britain with Chris Tarrant
programme.desc: The broadcaster examines how trains transformed the nation and shaped modern Britain. He begins in the cab of Puffing Billy, the world's oldest-surviving steam locomotive, which was built in 1813 and designed to move coal along a five-mile stretch of track from a Northumberland mine to the docks. Chris also tells the story of Henry Booth, who not only championed George Stephenson's famous Rocket, but also helped finance it, and talks about the work of the navvies who dug the tunnels and laid the tracks

programme.title: Entertainment News on 5
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: Milkshake! Monkey's Amazing Adventures
programme.desc: The character visits Belfast, where he tries some traditional Northern Irish food and explores the land of giants. The Milkshakers show how to create shamrock pieces of art

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: While on safari with Carlos and Tracker, Mayor Humdinger steals a magic mask from a temple and starts behaving like a monkey

programme.title: Bee Movie (2007)
programme.desc: A bee wearies of a life dedicated to producing honey and decides to leave his hive. During his foray into the wider world, he befriends a florist. However, when he realises what becomes of the honey his species toils so hard to make, he resolves to sue the entire human race for stealing from his fellow creatures. Animated comedy, with the voices of Jerry Seinfeld, Renee Zellweger and Chris Rock

programme.title: The Secret of Kells (2009)
programme.desc: A boy living in a medieval monastery under constant attack by Viking raiders acquires an unfinished book of mystical knowledge. The task of completing the tome falls to him, so he ventures into a haunted forest in search of the secrets required, where he must face his own darkest fears. Animated fantasy adventure, with the voices of Evan McGuire, Christen Mooney and Brendan Gleeson

programme.title: Lawrence of Arabia (1962)
programme.desc: An enigmatic British Army officer tries to unite the Arab nations against the Turks during the First World War, but comes into conflict with the military authorities when he engages the enemy with guerrilla tactics instead of more conventional methods. However, his increasingly torn loyalties leave him close to madness. Oscar-winning epic drama directed by David Lean, starring Peter O'Toole, Omar Sharif, Anthony Quinn, Alec Guinness and Jack Hawkins

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981)
programme.desc: Intrepid archaeologist Indiana Jones goes in search of the legendary Ark of the Covenant, a biblical artefact of devastating power. His quest leads him to Egypt, where the Nazis are plotting to use the Ark to further Hitler's plans for world domination - aided by Jones's deceitful French rival. The first of five big-screen action adventures, starring Harrison Ford as Indy, with Karen Allen, Paul Freeman and John Rhys-Davies

programme.title: The Equalizer (2014)
programme.desc: A retired secret agent applies his talents to the task of helping victims of injustice. When he witnesses a prostitute being beaten up by a pimp, he kills the man, an act that draws him into a battle to the death with a Russian crime syndicate. Action thriller based on the 1980s TV series, starring Denzel Washington and Chloe Grace Moretz

programme.title: Ready or Not (2019)
programme.desc: Grace Le Domas is a young bride whose wedding night takes a sinister turn when her eccentric new in-laws force her to take part in a terrifying game. Directors Matt Bettinelli-Olpin and Tyler Gillett's comedy horror, starring Samara Weaving, Adam Brody, Mark O'Brien, Henry Czerny and Andie MacDowell

programme.title: A Vigilante (2019)
programme.desc: After escaping her violent husband, a woman makes it her life's mission to help free others in danger. Drama, starring Olivia Wilde and Morgan Spector

programme.title: True Grit (1969)
programme.desc: One-eyed, over-the-hill US Marshal Rooster Cogburn reluctantly agrees to help a girl track down her father's killer. The quest is complicated by a Texas Ranger, who is also on the murderer's trail, and a host of villains who have few qualms about disposing of the meddling youngster and her protector. Western, starring an Oscar-winning John Wayne alongside Jeff Corey, Kim Darby, Glen Campbell, Robert Duvall and Dennis Hopper

programme.title: Mother's Day (2016)
programme.desc: As Mother's Day approaches, an array of seemingly unconnected characters all find themselves reconsidering their relationships with their mothers and what motherhood mean to them. Garry Marshall's ensemble comedy in which various families go through dramatic turning points, starring Julia Roberts, Jennifer Aniston, Kate Hudson, Jason Sudeikis, Jennifer Garner and Timothy Olyphant

programme.title: Star Trek: Nemesis (2002)
programme.desc: The crew of the Starship Enterprise is sent to form an alliance with old enemies the Romulans after the alien empire is taken over by a new leader - a clone of Captain Picard. Though claiming to want peace, Starfleet's finest soon realise he has more sinister plans in mind, involving a doomsday weapon that could destroy Earth. Sci-fi adventure, starring Patrick Stewart, Tom Hardy and Brent Spiner

programme.title: Hidden Figures (2016)
programme.desc: As the space race reaches fever pitch in the early 1960s, a trio of female African-American mathematicians attempt to overcome prejudice and find work with NASA. Their remarkable skills prove vital in getting an astronaut into orbit and bringing him safely back to Earth, but to realise their potential they must overcome deep-seated prejudice in the space programme and society as a whole. Fact-based drama, starring Taraji P Henson, Octavia Spencer, Janelle Monae and Kevin Costner

programme.title: Murder on the Orient Express (2017)
programme.desc: An American businessman travelling on the Orient Express from Istanbul to Paris tries to hire Hercule Poirot to be his bodyguard as he has had death threats made against him. The sleuth refuses, but wakes up the following morning to learn the man has been stabbed to death while the train was held up by heavy snow - and there is no shortage of suspects among the passengers. Agatha Christie mystery, directed by and starring Kenneth Branagh, with Daisy Ridley, Derek Jacobi and Johnny Depp

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)
programme.desc: The intrepid archaeologist, with his young sidekick and a nightclub singer in tow, is stranded in India, where he takes on a mission to recover magical sacred stones from the hands of an evil cult engaged in human sacrifice and child slavery. Steven Spielberg's action adventure, starring Harrison Ford, Kate Capshaw, Ke Huy Quan and Amrish Puri

programme.title: Amanda (2018)
programme.desc: A young man takes on the responsibility of raising his seven-year-old niece Amanda, after his sister is killed in a terrorist attack on Paris. Mikhaël Hers's drama, starring Vincent Lacoste and Isaure Multrier. In French, with English subtitles

programme.title: Dead Reckoning (1947)
programme.desc: A veteran paratrooper is drawn into a web of murder, gambling and blackmail by the former girlfriend of an comrade, who went missing from a train while the men were on their way to awarded medals in a ceremony in Washington. Film noir murder mystery, starring Humphrey Bogart, Lizabeth Scott, William Prince and Morris Carnovsky

programme.title: Appointment with Danger (1950)
programme.desc: A nun is targeted by two murderers when they realise she is the only witness to one of their killings, and it is up to postal inspector to protect her and bring the men to justice. Noir thriller, starring Phyllis Calvert, Alan Ladd and Paul Stewart

programme.title: Arabian Nights (1942)
programme.desc: The story of two half-brothers - one the heroic caliph, the other an evil usurper - as they do battle for the right to rule their kingdom, and win the hand of beautiful dancer Sherazade. Adaptation of the classic adventure tales, starring Jon Hall, Maria Montez, Sabu and Leif Erickson

programme.title: Ten Wanted Men (1955)
programme.desc: A law-abiding Arizona rancher runs into trouble when he unwittingly makes an enemy of a neighbouring landowner, who resents him for having befriended and comforted his abused mistress. The jealous man then recruits nine gunmen in a bid to drive his rival out of the territory. Western, starring Randolph Scott, Richard Boone, Donna Martell and Jocelyn Brando

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
programme.desc: The intrepid archaeologist sets out to find his estranged father, who has gone missing while searching for the Holy Grail. Once reunited, the duo team up to finish the task and locate the sacred relic before the Nazis get their hands on it. Action adventure sequel directed by Steven Spielberg, the third instalment in the successful franchise. Harrison Ford stars as the titular hero, alongside Sean Connery, Alison Doody, River Phoenix, Julian Glover and Denholm Elliott

programme.title: Mission: Impossible (1996)
programme.desc: Secret agents suspect there is a traitor in their organisation when their latest assignment ends in disaster. The sole survivor is accused of being the mole, forcing him to go on the run to clear his name. However, in the process, he discovers a former Russian spy is selling information about the world's leading undercover operatives. Action thriller based on the 1960s TV series, starring Tom Cruise, Jon Voight and Ving Rhames

programme.title: The Firm (1993)
programme.desc: Harvard law graduate Mitch is headhunted to work for a prestigious law firm, despite his wife's warnings that it is too good to be true. After two of his colleagues are murdered, Mitch is approached by the FBI and informed the company is controlled by the Mafia - leaving him in a deadly predicament. Thriller, adapted from the novel by John Grisham, starring Tom Cruise, Gene Hackman, Jeanne Tripplehorn and Holly Hunter

programme.title: Playground (2021)
programme.desc: A young girl's loyalties are tested when she witnesses her brother being bullied at school. Writer/director Lauren Wandel's drama, starring Maya Vanderbeque and Gunter Duret. In French, with English subtitles

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube
programme.desc: Comedy clips showcasing amusing internet videos, featuring weddings, space and sci-fi fans

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Mitch reluctantly lets his distressed colleague Brenda stay the night, Phil and Claire think Alex has let her imagination run wild after she tells them she has a boyfriend, and Jay hits a Manny-shaped obstacle while trying to get out of accompanying Gloria to a party. Kirsten Johnston (3rd Rock from the Sun) guest stars, with Jesse Tyler Ferguson, Ty Burrell, Ed O'Neill and Julie Bowen

programme.title: Supernanny US
programme.desc: Jo Frost helps Angela and Dom Zampogna, whose three children have the pickiest palettes and will only consume unhealthy foods, causing them to throw temper tantrums

programme.title: Don't Tell the Bride
programme.desc: Groom-to-be Bobby plans a nautical-themed wedding day, but his fiancee Jas dreams of an intimate local wedding

programme.title: Don't Tell the Bride
programme.desc: Love-struck groom Micky has three weeks and £13,000 to plan the perfect wedding for demanding bride-to-be Sophia. However, while Sophia wants a blingy wedding that puts her centre stage, Micky is hoping to impress her with a winter wonderland

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The chef heads to family owned Italian restaurant Giuseppi's in Macomb Township, Michigan. Father and son Joe and Sam Borgia's constant fighting is driving customers away, and Gordon discovers one of the restaurateurs is concealing a serious health problem. Nevertheless, he sets about rescuing them from disaster and turning around the failing business

programme.desc: The chef heads to Italian family restaurant Sabatiello's in Stamford, Connecticut, where the owner's fiery temper upsets the staff and has left him more than $1million in debt. Gordon's help is urgently needed to get customers back through the door, but the restaurateur does not take kindly to criticism and closes the restaurant down when his employees turn on him

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA

Gordon has some harsh criticism about the unhygienic kitchen and the quality of the food being served, but the owner has trouble accepting his advice

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: The Dunphys and Manny are on their way back from breakfast at the pancake house when Phil is forced to swerve out of the way of an oncoming truck, a brush with death that prompts them all to re-evaulate their lives. Comedy, starring Ty Burrell

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Claire confronts neighbours from hell Ronnie and Amber about the eyesore of a boat on their front lawn - and when they refuse to move it, Phil has no alternative but to call in the big guns - dad Frank and a few of his retired pals. Meanwhile, Cam takes Lily to clown school

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Phil takes it hard when Luke gives him the 'teenage cold shoulder' - a day he always knew was coming - so he goes in search of a stand-in son. A dilemma presents itself for Jay when Gloria suspects Joe is allergic to Stella, while Mitchell does some freelance legal work for Claire, an experience he finds rather enlightening

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Valentine's Day arrives, which for the Dunphys means their chance to dress up and romance each other as their once-a-year role-play characters Clive and Juliana - although Claire begins to worry that Phil prefers her like this. Meanwhile, Jay's romantic plans hit a snag in the sassy form of Gloria's sister Sonia, who ends up trying to seduce him, and wires are crossed when Mitch and Cam find themselves in a sticky situation with pal Anders

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: The Dunphys are flying home from a weekend away, but Phil is less than happy when Claire takes the only first-class seat available. Mitch and Cam throw a belated baby shower for their friend Sal, and are surprised to find that motherhood seems to have changed her, and Jay shows Manny how to defend himself against a bully in his cooking class. Elizabeth Banks, Nathan Lane and Penn Jillette guest star

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon's obsession with gift-giving etiquette annoys his friends as Christmas approaches. Meanwhile, Leonard is thrilled to meet an award-winning scientist, only to be filled with jealousy when his new colleague takes an interest in Penny. With guest star Michael Trucco (Battlestar Galactica, One Tree Hill)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and the gang are excited when Barry Kripke challenges them to a robot duel. Meanwhile, Howard is devastated when Penny finally tells him what she thinks of his chauvinism. Guest starring John Ross Bowie

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny runs into money troubles, so Sheldon offers to lend her some cash to help her pay the rent. However, when Leonard discovers his neighbour's ex-boyfriend Kurt is the cause of her financial woes, he gathers the gang for a confrontation. Starring Jim Parsons, Johnny Galecki and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: The Goldbergs

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Fiery chef Gordon Ramsay comes to the aid of the owners of Hannah & Mason's, a French bistro in Cranbury, New Jersey. programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay tries to help a struggling seafood restaurant in Manhattan, where the three owners regularly come into conflict as they each try to assert their authority over the business, causing confusion for all. When one of the trio stubbornly resists the changes the Scottish chef is hoping to implement, sparks begin to fly

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin (2011)
programme.desc: A reporter's purchase of a model ship brings him under threat from a ruthless criminal, as it is one of a series of clues to the location of the real vessel, which holds a pirate's lost treasure. Steven Spielberg's animated adventure based on Herge's comic-strip series, with the voices of Jamie Bell, Andy Serkis and Daniel Craig

programme.title: Modern Family

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The gang re-creates a prom night on the roof of the apartment building when the girls decide they would like to re-enact their evenings with their current partners. However, Sheldon feels under pressure to take part in all the romantic traditions, and Howard worries about who Stuart will bring as his date. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Amy and Penny use Bernadette to spy on Leonard and Priya after the couple invite her and Howard to dinner. An experimental drug helps Raj overcome his fear of talking to women, but proves more effective than he had expected. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki and Jim Parsons

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: Unexpected revelations are on the cards during the Johnsons' first game night together with the Butlers, when Gemma is prompted to rectify a past wrong

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: Dave plans a special anniversary celebration for Gemma while Calvin and Tina babysit the Johnsons' son, Grover, during an evening when nothing goes according to plan

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Luke and Manny's hot-tempered basketball coach quits, causing Jay and Phil to compete for the position. Elsewhere, Mitchell introduces Cameron to a prospective employer. Comedy, starring Nolan Gould, Rico Rodriguez, Ed O'Neill and Ty Burrell

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Claire is suspicious when Grandpa Dunphy pays a surprise visit, while Cameron tries to find his inner drummer when he joins Dylan's band. Meanwhile, Jay and Gloria regret taking Manny to see a horror film. Comedy, guest starring Fred Willard

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: The youngster starts an internet flame war, and Missy stands up to the boys on her baseball team. Elsewhere, Meemaw is unhappy when George Sr spends time with her new boyfriend

programme.title: Young Sheldon

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

Meanwhile, Raj and Amy offer to settle a dispute with a game of table tennis. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: Hollyoaks
